data.title: Get to Know Your New Partner in Network Monitoring!
data.meta_description: PRTG Network Monitor is built around your need for an easier and relaxed solution to all your network supervision tasks.
data.text:
Running a business successfully means keeping an eye on every aspect of it. Apart from monitoring the performance of your employees, deals, client relations, and sales, there is one more thing that a business owner should have a crystal-clear view of – their network.

We don’t mean “people” when we say network, what we mean is the performance and security of your systems, applications, data storage units, endpoints, and more. Network Monitoring is not a new concept for organizations. There are a lot of business owners, IT Heads, and Security Experts that know how important it is. Hence, network monitoring solutions is also in high demand.

With hundreds of network monitoring solutions in the market, what really is the best? Well, a network monitoring solution from “The Monitoring Experts” of course!

To make it easier for IT, Network, and Systems Administrators to stay on top of their organization’s technology infrastructure, Paessler AG, the leading German company that provides thousands of companies worldwide with network management solutions, has appointed IPSYSTEMS, Inc to be its FIRST Philippine Distributor of PRTG Network Monitor.

PRTG Network Monitor is built around your need for an easier and relaxed solution to all your network supervision tasks. Dubbed as the “swiss army knife” for IT teams, PRTG Network Monitor is packed with features & functionalities that make the surveillance of your entire IT infrastructure simple, easy, fast, and most of all, efficient. Moreover, PRTG Network Monitor is the number one choice for clients like Formula 1’s Media Center, Naples Airport, The Ritz-Carlton Investing Company, and Fulham Football Club to mention a few.

As mentioned before, the mastermind behind PRTG Network Monitor is Paessler AG. Paessler is based in Nuremberg, Germany, and have been providing solutions for businesses of varying sizes from different industries since 1997. To date, they are serving more than 500,000 users in over 170 countries.

Paessler AG’s passion in providing a better way to monitor and manage networks has led them to prioritize the research & development of their solutions. Guided by the growing needs and constantly changing pain points of their customer base, Paessler AG has been able to make PRTG Network Monitor even more robust and flexible over the years.

Well, apart from its stellar list of clients and trustworthy reviews, there are more reasons for you to entrust your IT infrastructure to PRTG Network Monitor.

It means you don’t need to install any other application for PRTG Network Monitor to run and do its job. It is a standalone software that can be installed and configured independently. Moreover, it supports protocols such as SNMP, WMI, HTTP, POP, FTP, NetFlow, sFlow, IP SLA, packet sniffing, etc.

PRTG Network Monitor has 10 built-in technologies to ensure that you get notified immediately should your network face any problems. It can send you notifications through email, push notifications inside the application or mobile app, audio warning files, and even trigger HTTP requests. PRTG Network Monitor’s on-premise edition can also support SMS text messages.

PRTG Network Monitor not only helps you keep an eye on the most important components of your network – from servers, bandwidths, applications and many more. What’s more, it also has the capability to cater to different network sizes Additionally, PRTG Network Monitor quickly finds the root cause of the problem, even if it’s from a different location (for example, DMZ and LAN).

PRTG Network Monitor has its own drag & drop map editor to cater to your customization needs. It also has an integrated reporting engine where you can save reports in HTML, PDF, or CSV. Additionally, PRTG Network Monitor can run on all current version of Windows. And if you’re always on the go, PRTG Network Monitor is also available via its Android and iOS apps.

With the importance of our network in our day-to-day operations, the availability and efficiency of your chosen network monitoring solution is crucial. With PRTG Network Monitor, you can have peace of mind because it works for you, not the other way around. Furthermore, with Paessler AG’s partnership with IPSYSTEMS, you can rest easy when you need support as IPSYSTEMS’ experts is there for you every step of the way.
